says \"heart\" (&lt;3 and &lt;/3 count): Evil says "heart" according to her voice, unprompted by donations
evil swears: Evil says a swear word / bad word. Even minor swears such as dumbass are included
makes up a person:
Evil makes up a random person, usually by name
If you need help, watch chat for :WHOMEGALUL: (WHOMEGALUL) emote spam
mentions other vtubers unprompted: Evil mentions other vtubers without being prompted by donations first
mentions vedal unprompted: Evil mentions Vedal unprompted, without being mentioned by donations/chat
mentions neuro unprompted: Evil mentions Neuro unprompted, without being mentioned by donations/chat. Mentioning her as "my sister" also counts
donowalls chatter: Evil ignores a message highlight / donation, does not count if a message is too long for priority
brings up previous stream unprompted: Evil mentions a previous stream unprompted, without the topic being brought up by donations/chat
calls herself god/goddess: Evil calls herself a god or a goddess
threatens chat: Evil threatens chat as a whole or a specific chatter in some way
loves chat: Evil says that she loves chat as a whole or a specific chatter
acts corpa: Evil acts corpa in some way, including begging for subs
tech issues: Evil has tech issues in some way, including sprouting her error phrase ("Someone tell Vedal there's a problem with my AI") several times
threatens to take over the world: Evil threatens to take over the world, regardless of which way she does it or what she does with said power
changes scene: The scene changes (to art review or games for example). Obviously the switches from the starting soon screen to Evil does not count
collab partner joins: A collab partner joins the call. This does include Vedal
changes title: Evil changes the stream title. You can tell if Evil changed it via the on-stream UI for title changes
makes a poll: Evil makes a poll, regardless of the content of said poll. You can tell if Evil created it via the on-stream UI for polls
calls neuro: Evil calls Neuro, her sister, during the stream
plays pipes sfx: Evil plays the pipes sound effect
zooms in: Evil zooms in (comes closer to the stream)
times out chatter: Evil times out a chatter and vocally mentions that she has done so
links to a website: Evil links to a random website, even if it doesn't resolve
strange noise: Evil's TTS makes a strange noise
\"crazy fuckin' robot body\": Evil mentions "Crazy Fuckin' Robot Body", either in passing or declares it as her anthem
